configs.author: PPSSPP
configs.name: PPSSPP VR
configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"PPSSPP VR is an open source PSP emulator for your VR devices like Quest and Pico","appName":"PPSSPP VR","customLinkFilterRegex":"\\/[0-9]+(?:_[0-9]+){1,2}\\/ppsspp_vr\\.apk$","filterByLinkText":false,"matchGroupToUse":"$1$3.$2$4$6$5","reverseSort":false,"skipSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"trackOnly":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"versionDetection":true,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"\\/(?:(?:([0-9]+)_([0-9]+)\\/ppsspp_vr\\.)|(?:([0-9]+)_([0-9]+)_([0-9]+)\\/ppsspp_vr(\\.)))apk$"}

description.en: PPSSPP VR is an open source PSP emulator for your VR devices like Quest and Pico
